body:
#### PR description:

Part of the migration in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061

According to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061#issuecomment-987355542 this is the last AlCa module missing an ES get() migration

#### PR validation:

Code compiles

title: Modernize HcalPatternSource.cc and HtrXmlPattern.cc
